text: I physically cannot fathom the idea that people take Roblox seriously I was messing about on Roblox with my friends just trolling people on an SCP game I think  we were probably never going to play it again but anyways An admin happened to be in the server and noticed what we were doing  He really said that we were  violating the roblox guidelines  like dude we were having fun this is a KIDS GAME but ok I refuse to believe that people take Roblox this seriously and treat it like an actual real life job
summary: A Roblox admin said that the players were violating the rules of the game because they were playing a children's game, which is against the rules. The player is shocked that people take the game so seriously.
cleaned: rob lox admin say player violate rule game play child game rule player shock people game seriously

text: crushed by societyup until this year i have been pretty naive to the world around me  then this year i started to take a class that forced me to look at the world around me  books like  ishmael  have exposed me to the truth of our society  it s hard to explain but now i feel like i have this profound knowledge of the universe that nobody else around me does  i don t want to be a part of this society that is destroying the earth and its helpless peoples  i want to break the chain and show the world that i would rather die than be a useless human who lives an average  pointless life  i have to get a job or ill starve on the streets  i have to graduate college or i ll never get a job  i have to graduate high school or i ll never get into college  the world and its rulers are corrupt and suppress any enjoyment i could imagine myself having  the people around me are so ignorant and it drives me insane  my parents are supportive but i don t really have a connection with them  maybe it s just a teenage thing but i seriously have a hard time even just making small talk with them  it s not their fault but i feel awful for making them feel like bad parents  after my first attempt  both my parents were completely ruined  i cant talk to them about how i feel because i m afraid they re going to send me back to the hospital or get disappointed in me  i don t have anyone that understands me  i get my hopes up just to inevitably get more crushed than before  people are disappointing and i know people care about me but i still feel alone  i wanna die so bad   if anyone knows how i feel or just can support me please let me know i m starting to get scared
summary: This year Isaac started to take a class that forced him to look at the world around him. He feels he has a profound knowledge of the universe that nobody else around him does. His parents are supportive but he doesn't have a connection with them.
cleaned: year isaac start class force look world feel profound knowledge universe parent supportive not connection
